sourcesContent: import Reacrt from 'react' import s from './Filters.module.css' const Filters = (props) => { const data = [] const setNewFilter = (key) => () => { switch (key){ case "id": props.setFilter({id: props.filter ? false : true}) break case "firstName": props.setFilter({firstName: props.filter ? false : true}) break case "lastName": props.setFilter({lastName: props.filter ? false : true}) break case "email": props.setFilter({email: props.filter ? false : true}) break case "phone": props.setFilter({phone: props.filter ? false : true}) break case "address": props.setFilter({address: props.filter ? false : true}) break case "description": props.setFilter({description: props.filter ? false : true}) break } } for (let key in props.data) { data.push({props.data[key]}) } return ( {data} ) } export default Filters
